parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**requiredObject** - get reserved campaigns of requiredObject,
**sort** - value to order result campaigns: *reward*, *proximity* (if you want to sort by proximity, add this flag with area but without radius!), *date*(default *date*),
**area** -latitude first, longitude last. Example [90,120]. Filter by area
**radius** -(if you want to find campaigns by search area, add radius, and area) Radius of area geo location, use only with **area** coordinates filter,
**coordinates** - latitude first, longitude last. Example [90,120]. Current user coordinates
**skip** - skip first records for infinity scroll
**limit** - limit count records

**area** -latitude first, longitude last. Example [90,120]. Filter by area
**radius** -(if you want to find campaigns by search area, add radius, and area) Radius of area geo location, use only with **area** coordinates filter,

 *primaryObject* - to load primary campaign at object

200.description: List of all campaigns whose monthly budget exceeds the number of reviews performed (first campaign at example - without required object in request, second with requiredObject in request)

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
Request for get history for guide only with messages, or all history for user
**limit** - limit of campaigns to show, default - 10
**skip** - count of campaigns to skip, default - 10
**status** - filter by status of campaigns. Enum: ["pending","active","inactive", "expired","deleted","payed","reachedLimit","onHold","suspended"]
**rewards** -  filter by status of users reservation. Enum: ["assigned","unassigned","completed","rejected","expired"]
**guideName** - Name of guide, to show his campaigns with conversation with users, if you want to get history for block MESSAGES use this field with flag onlyWithMessages
**guideNames** - Name of guides, to filter
**campaignNames** - Name of campaigns, to filter
**userName** - Name of user, to show campaigns in which he participated, if you want to get history for block HISTORY use this field, dont use field guideName
**onlyWithMessages** - flag for show only campaigns with messages under reservation permlink, default - false
**sort** - inquiryDate - sort by first appeal of user, latest - sort by latest message under reservation permlink(include only messages from guide and user),reservation - sort by time of reservation. Enum: ["inquiryDate","latest","reservation"]
**caseStatus** - filter by some cases, all - without filter, open - filter - only if last message from user, close - filter by last message from guide. Enum: ["open","close","all"]
**fraudSuspicion** - special boolean flag to get only fraud suspicion campaigns can use with guideName
**reservationPermlink** - permlink to user reservation. This field used for showing card on messages page

200.description: List of history campaigns for one sponsor or one user

parameters.name: params
parameters.description:
**requiredObject** - get reserved campaigns of requiredObject,
**sort** - value to order result campaigns: *reward*, *payout*, *proximity* (if you want to sort by proximity, add this flag with area but without radius!), *date*(default *date*), *default*(at first sort by proximity, after that sort by payout),
**area** -latitude first, longitude last. Example [90,120]. Filter by area
**radius** -(if you want to find campaigns by search area, add radius, and area) Radius of area geo location, use only with **area** coordinates filter,
**coordinates** - latitude first, longitude last. Example [90,120]. Current user coordinates
**skip** - skip first records for infinity scroll
**limit** - limit count records

get.description: Return the approximate output amount for a given conversion at the current exchange rate. This isn't a guaranteed rate -- conversion rates change frequently, and the rate of any transaction is only "locked in" once the transaction is fully confirmed on the input blockchain. This returns the rate the user would get if their input transaction were fully confirmed at the time of this call.
get.summary: Estimate the output amount for a conversion

parameters.name: inputAmount
parameters.description: The amount of the inputCoinType the user wants to convert. This is in nominal units of the input cryptocoin type, so 1.0 would mean 1 BTC, not 1 satoshi

parameters.name: inputCoinType
parameters.description: The coin type the user wishes to send to BlockTrades

parameters.name: outputCoinType
parameters.description: The coin type the user wishes to receive from BlockTrades

parameters.name: affiliateId
parameters.description: The ID associated with a particular affiliate using our systems

campaigns.name: Copy Magic Coffee Campaign with 2 MatchBots

delkos/reserve-gdgyz4j7cb.author: delkos
delkos/reserve-gdgyz4j7cb.title: Rewards reservations
delkos/reserve-gdgyz4j7cb.body:
User delkos (@delkos) has reserved the rewards of 1.5 HIVE for a period of 5 days to write a review of Americano, Magic coffee

User eligibility requirements:

Only users who meet all eligibility criteria can participate in this rewards campaign.

  • Minimum Waivio expertise: 0
  • Minimum number of followers: 0
  • Minimum number of posts: 0
  • User account is not blacklisted by olegvladim or referenced accounts.

Post requirements:

For the review to be eligible for the award, all the following requirements must be met:

  • Minimum 1 original photos of Americano
  • Link to Americano
  • Link to Magic coffee

Sponsor reserves the right to refuse the payment if review is suspected to be fraudulent, spam, poorly written or for other reasons as stated in the agreement.

Reward:

The amount of the reward is determined in HIVE at the time of reservation. The reward will be paid in the form of a combination of upvotes (Hive Power) and direct payments (liquid HIVE). Only upvotes from registered accounts (olegvladim , vancouverdining, waivio.match ) count towards the payment of rewards. The value of all other upvotes is not subtracted from the specified amount of the reward.

Legal:

By making the reservation, you confirm that you have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions of the Service Agreement Terms and Conditions of the Service Agreement
